title: Compute the Field Normalized Citation Score of a publication — FNCS

Compute the Field Normalized Citation Score of a publication — FNCS

Scheidsteger et al. (2023) remove upper 1 percent citation counts using OpenAlex. affects FNCS, percentile rank.

text: function downloads large set publications certain field certain years. Retrieving 10,000 documents API takes 1-2 min. Ideally, cached locally.

title: Get a reference set for field normalized citation rates — get_reference_set
code: get_reference_set(   from_year,   to_year = NA,   n_per_year = 10000,   concept.id = "C15744967",   verbose = TRUE )

title: Get a reference set for field normalized citation rates — get_reference_set
text: from_year start year range to_year end year range (optional, defaults from_year) n_per_year number documents retrieve per requested year (optional, defaults 10000). Values larger 10000 possible (split multiple OA requests). concept.id vector concept.ids search (optional, defaults "C15744967", .e. "Psychology") verbose Show OA API progress?

title: Get a reference set for field normalized citation rates — get_reference_set
text: data frame containing document id, year, cited_by_count, number authors retrieved documents

title: Get a reference set for field normalized citation rates — get_reference_set

title: Compute h-index and hIa-index — h_index
text: Computes h-index hIa-index author. need provide exactly one parameters search, display_name author.id: search allows fuzzy search author's name (e.g. without middle initial). Might return many matches display_name allows provide vector multiple versions name (e.g., c("Hans Müller", "Hans Mueller", "Hans J. Muller")) author.id OpenAlex ID authors.

title: Compute h-index and hIa-index — h_index
code: h_index(   search = NULL,   display_name = NULL,   author.id = NULL,   first_pub_year = NA,   academic_age_bonus = 0 )

title: Compute h-index and hIa-index — h_index
text: search character string author's name searching OpenAlex API. Allows fuzzy search (e.g. without middle initial). display_name character vector exact author's names searching OpenAlex API. cvan provide multiple variants vector. author.id character vector OpenAlex author ID(s) (.e., ID starting ".......") searching OpenAlex API. first_pub_year integer year author's first publication. provided, estimated retrieved publications. academic_age_bonus Years subtracted active academic life (e.g. due child care). example, SNF subtracts 1.5 years per child (see https://www.snf.ch/en/cciM9NWuvhOVKRxv/news/news-200803-career-funding--researchers-overall-performance-counts).

title: Compute h-index and hIa-index — h_index
text: list containing net academic age, h-index hIa-index author.
